Class LZWCompression

  • java.lang.Object
    • LZWCompression

  • public class LZWCompression
extends java.lang.Object
    Compress files using LZW compress algorithm.
    Author:
    Jiaqi Zhang

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static int BYTE_LENGTH
      Length of a byte.
      private static int CHUNK_LENGTH
      Length of a chunk.
      private int leftBits
      The bits left by the previous chunk when converting to byte.
      private int leftLength
      Length of the bits left.
      private int nextCode
      Next code index.
      private java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> table
      Table storing the mapping information for strings and codes.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void compress(java.lang.String filein, java.lang.String fileout)
      Compress the input file and output the compressed file.
      private void ensureTableSpace()
      Ensure the space of the table.
      private void initializeTable()
      Initialize the code table.
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
      This program works for both ASCII files and binary files.
      Degree of compression: words.html - from 2.5MB to 1.1MB, CrimeLatLonXY1990.csv - from 279KB to 139KB, 01_Overview.mp4 - from 25MB to 33.8MB.
      private void outputBits(java.lang.String s, java.io.DataOutputStream out)
      Output bits to the file.

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        This program works for both ASCII files and binary files.
        Degree of compression: words.html - from 2.5MB to 1.1MB, CrimeLatLonXY1990.csv - from 279KB to 139KB, 01_Overview.mp4 - from 25MB to 33.8MB.
        HashMap is better for compression.
        HashMap: words.html - 497.0 milliseconds, CrimeLatLonXY1990.csv - 135.0 milliseconds, 01_Overview.mp4 - 4889.0 milliseconds.
        TreeMap: words.html - 963.0 milliseconds, CrimeLatLonXY1990.csv - 180.0 milliseconds, 01_Overview.mp4 - 11596.0 milliseconds.
        Parameters:
        args - "c" or "d" for compress or decompress, and two filenames
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • compress

        public void compress(java.lang.String filein,
                     java.lang.String fileout)
              throws java.io.IOException
        Compress the input file and output the compressed file.
        Parameters:
        filein - the name of the input file
        fileout - the name of the output file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • initializeTable

        private void initializeTable()
        Initialize the code table.

      • ensureTableSpace

        private void ensureTableSpace()
        Ensure the space of the table. If the table is full, initialize it again.

      • outputBits

        private void outputBits(java.lang.String s,
                        java.io.DataOutputStream out)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Output bits to the file.
        Parameters:
        s - the string corresponding to the output bits
        out - the output stream
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
